1.content:
You wake up lieing on a soft bed, groggy from your recent cruise. It sure was fun and relaxing on that ship, except that storm. But now you were home, and... no, the storm! It tore up the boat, you were on a piece of driftwood, and you blacked out after swimming to some island! You opened your eyes and looked around. Though it was dark, you could tell this wasn't your room, it seemed to be for someone a bit bigger than the average human, what with the big chairs and other furniture, you were barely taking up any space on that bed. As you tried to fit this together in your head, the door opened, and an immense figure walked in the room. "Oh, finally awake," a female voice said as she closed the door. You couldn't tell what she looked like, except she was huge, the tallest and fattest women you'd ever seen. She walked over to the window and opened the curtains, filling the room with sunlight which blinded you temporarily. "You've been out for a few days, thought you might be in a coma or something," the woman added and as your eyes adjusted you recognized the woman in front of you.

Where do you know her from?

info.brief_description: You wake up and find yourself on an island populated entirely by really fat gigantic women
info.description:
You were on a cruise ship when a huge storm kicked up in the middle of the ocean and sunk the ship. You woke up clinging to a piece of driftwood, alone. You swam for a far off island, and reached the beach before passing out.

This island consists entirely of super sized big beautiful women from assorted media and even real life, any woman can be on this island but they are all at least 10 ft tall and weigh at least a quarter ton, and those are just the smallest of them. The thing is that they came to get away from men and if a man is ever found on the island he will be punished.Fortunately for you, one woman decided to hide you and will try to keep you safe until she leaves. You've just got to try to remain hidden from the other women of the island, who may either turn you in, or keep you for her own pleasure, though depending on what kind of guardian you end up with you may like the other women better.

The women on this island are easily turned on, a side effect of their growth. They can be out of character in this story so long as their personalities remain somewhat close to their usual ones. The main character is not allowed to die or sustain a serious injury (unless he is healed quickly after), and no other men will come into the story. The woman who finds you is the main one in that particular branch of the story, so if you choose Samus to start with, she is the one you'll have to stick with, no switching people in a story line. However, that doesn't mean you can't do things with other women from time to time, just make sure they don't take over Samus' part (or whoever you choose). Your protector is also doing this for different reasons, some might just want to keep you safe from the goodness of their hearts, others might want a few services rendered for their protection, and yet others might just want to keep you to torture personally, but whatever the reason they don't want to see you found by anyone else.

I think that covers things.
